conclusion: To solve the problem, I will analyze the v-t graph to determine the acceleration of objects A and B. I will examine the shape of the curves to understand how acceleration changes over time.

The acceleration of an object is given by the derivative of its velocity with respect to time.

conclusion: If the graph is not a perfect parabola, acceleration changes over time.

conclusion: Acceleration is not constant for both objects.
